metadata.title: CVE-2020-13321 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions prior to 13.1. Usernameformat restrictions could be bypassed allowing for html tags to be added.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
